          <title>
            <string language="en">Ptolemaic system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ptolemaic System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Système de Ptolemaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistema de Ptolemaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistema di Ptolemaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύστημα Ptolemaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema de Ptolemaic</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the Earth-centred theory in Ptolemy's model of the relative positions of the planets, the Sun and the Moon.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jupiter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mercury</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ptolemaic system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ptolemy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">saturn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">venus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Masse-zentrierte 
Theorie im Modell Ptolemäus der relativen Positionen der Planeten, 
der Sonne und des Mondes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la théorie 
Terre-centrée en modèle de Ptolémée des positions relatives des 
planètes, du soleil et de la lune.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a teoria Terra-centrada 
no modelo de Ptolemy das posições relativas dos planetas, do sol e 
da lua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la teoria 
Terra-centrata nel modello del Ptolemy delle posizioni relative dei 
pianeti, del sole e della luna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γη-κεντροθετημένη θεωρία 
στο μοντέλο Ptolemy των σχετικών θέσεων των πλανητών, του 
ήλιου και του φεγγαριού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la teoría 
Tierra-centrada en el modelo de Ptolemy de las posiciones relativas de
los planetas, del sol y de la luna.</string>
          </description>
